ygData.subject: RE: Re[2]:Experience and Twinking
ygData.msgSnippet: ...  ... well for me this is true if i am grouped with friends or guildmates.  if i am in a pickup group, then i put just as much
ygData.messageBody:
At 04:26 PM 2/10/00 -0700, you wrote:
>From: Michael DuBois <mdubois@...>
>
<elided some other stuff>

>The problem is when a Primary character is
>winning loots for rare drops for their TWINK
>when a fellow party members' PRIMARY character
>needs the item.
>
>There lies the problem.
>
>My group members ALWAYS come before my twink.


well for me this is true if i am grouped with friends or guildmates. if
i am in a pickup group, then i put just as much effort as the next guy,
spent just as much time fighting things as the next guy, and am
just as deserving of any loot we happen to find.



>Hiscanth
